Author: slogn
Title: [ANN] {ICO} SLOGN Logistics Coin ICO July 25 2017-UPD: ICO DEFERRED
Body: Logistics is just sooo huge I believe there'll be place for several projects. As far as we know we are the main one for U.S trucking industry which by itself is $800 billion industry. Here are the key numbers: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uRRO2HEspXE Govind Singh, business strategy, explains it better here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gzKKsqGlp6E We are not the only one with the same idea. Influential personalities and teams are approaching us now willing to unite efforts to build software together and this has been our goal - to unite community around the problem that exists in trucking.  The way how we came to blockchain was natural - we kept digging looking for technology that we thought would be the right fit for us. It was evolution from SPA + RESTFul backend to Microservices with Kafka, then we turned down entity-oriented frameworks and equipped ourselves with event sourcing and CQRS, and eventually blockchain being in a way the distributed event-sourcing system.  Our key vision is that it is impossible to build solution for trucking industry alone, therefore we are working on the platform that will be available for everyone to build on top. Our white paper sheds the light about how we see the [Suspicious link removed]ponent.  I hope I was able to answer your question, it is a pleasure to receive mature and deep questions!

Author: slogn
Title: [ANN] {ICO} SLOGN Logistics Coin ICO July 25 2017-UPD: ICO DEFERRED
Body: PreICO Results  ATTENTION — OUR PREICO IS OVER. PLEASE DO NOT SEND ANY MORE CONTRIBUTION TRANSACTIONS.  We would like to thank you for your participation. Your contributions are very inspiring! We DID NOT reach a minimum of 1,000 ETH. PLEASE REFUND your ETH contributions following instructions below.  How to refund your ETH Generate transaction with: 0 (ZERO) ETH to the address 0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0. IMPORTANT: (1) Set data to 0x590e1ae3; Set Gas limit to: 50,000 (Fifty Thousand Gas). IMPORTANT: MYETHERWALLET.COM can throw red warning message: ”Could not estimate gas. There are not enough funds in the account, or the receiving contract address would throw an error. Feel free to manually set the gas and proceed. The error message upon sending may be more informative.” That is expected behavior. You will need to set gas price manually as described in the previous message.  SLOGN Initial Coin Offering Is Deferred  Thank you for participation in our pre-ICO and interest to the project! We received many inquiries for business partnerships, software development and media coverage and are going to proceed with the project implementation and deployment in the U.S trucking industry. We anticipate to run the ICO in the future.  For any inquiries please e-mail us at info@slogn.net as well as on any of our official social media channels.

Author: Euro1000
Title: [ANN] {ICO} SLOGN Logistics Coin ICO July 25 2017-UPD: ICO DEFERRED
Body: OK, that make sense. Regarding #2: Then you would also be able to implement some kind of Freight exchange where trucking companies can offer freight capacities in order to maximize their load.  In one video you mentioned that in the US you also have several small companies. We have the same problem here in Germany where you have SME's where the boss himself drives the truck while he is booking the next order. So, there a no IT departments which can develop or maintain any software solution. So, any leightweight solution could help here.  Of course, there are several logistics projects going on - but logistics is a huge field. I.e. Maersk is running a project (using hyperledger), but they are (as far as I know) mainly focussing on shipping lines incl. pre- and postcarriage on containerised cargo and containerised cargo is a different field.

Author: Logannj
Title: [ANN] {ICO} SLOGN Logistics Coin ICO July 25 2017-UPD: ICO DEFERRED
Body: Hi all. I participated in Pre ICO today. This is my first ICO so I am clueless on how to collect my solgn tokens. The ICO sheet doesn't gives steps. They gave great instructions on how to send them eth though, lol. I am using the latest parity wallet. I started googling and found some articles about watching tokens but I'm not sure if that's what I need to do. I saw on blockchain that they sent me my slogn tokens and my wallet is listed as the token holder which makes sense. My thing is how do I get those slogn tokens into my parity wallet and back them up. I think I'm good on the ICO process, it's just that last part of getting the tokens. Any help or links would be most welcomed.  thanks for the help.

Title: [ANN] {ICO} SLOGN Logistics Coin ICO July 25 2017-UPD: ICO DEFERRED

Author: slogn
Title: [ANN] {ICO} SLOGN Logistics Coin ICO July 25 2017-UPD: ICO DEFERRED
Body: SLOGN to reserve $10 Million For Open Source Contributors    Our goal is to build the industry standard for everyone who wants to develop their app or widget for logistics. No company in the world can do this for logistics without involvement of software community. Therefore we will put ~$10M into Open Source Tournament fund to select best companies to contribute to the platform.  The app you would build would instantly receive access to millions of potential users across logistics industry.  We receive a lot of SUPPORT AND LOVE and it helps us stay super efficient on marketing. We didn’t start to use our bounty fund for marketing and will divert into software development. List of Selection Hackathons “Driver Mobile Wallet and Virtual Assistant” on September 22nd in San Francisco, “Open API Platform & Basic Dashboard” on December 1st in New York, “Smart Contract Wizard” on March 16th, 2018 in Berlin, “Escrow / Instant Pay System” on June 15th, 2018 in Toronto, and “Machine Learning Platform” on September 7th, 2018 in Lviv.

Author: slogn
Title: [ANN] {ICO} SLOGN Logistics Coin ICO July 25 2017-UPD: ICO DEFERRED
Body: SLOGN Logistics Coin announces ICO for $700 Billion US Trucking Industry.  Links:          Website: https://www.slogn.net Medium: https://medium.com/@SLOGN Twitter: https://twitter.com/slogncoin Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/slognnet/ - << 1st place where we will be announcing NEXT STEPS BOUNTY AND OF PAID CODING TOURNAMENTS Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company-beta/18130326/ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb_Ookt6bE2rRtNMon0X8Qg WHITE PAPER: https://github.com/SLOGNNet/whitepaper/blob/master/whitepaper.pdf  Slogn is leveraging blockchain technology for $700 billion (per year) strong US trucking industry. With over 400K trucking companies, 20K freight brokers, 1.8 million drivers and many software applications it is impossible for suppliers and carriers to connect and collaborate on a single platform to share data and optimize resources for the benefit of everyone. Deadhead miles alone are costing each truck $5k per year in losses. Slogn platform enables many players and software providers in the industry to connect, collaborate and consolidate using blockchain and artificial intelligence. Founded by seasoned technology and trucking industry experts, SLOGN is a high level open source platform and marketplace that contains cryptocurrency wallets, multilayered node software, blockchain connector SDKs, wizards for visual design of smart contracts on mobile or desktop and works on blockchain. US Trucking industry needs significant innovation for transparency, efficiency, and accountability. SLOGN is set to transform logistics through open source solutions that everyone can take, use and contribute to. WHITE PAPER: https://github.com/SLOGNNet/whitepaper/blob/master/whitepaper.pdf  TEAM  Govind Singh, Product Strategy/ Past Trucking  With 11 years in trucking and IT, Govind is the perfect candidate that is able to solve the problems of the fragmented US trucking Industry. Expensive server-based logistic software, never-ending government/regulatory forms, unfriendly software interfaces with limited mobile access, inefficient shipper-to-broker-to-carrier marketplace interactions, several compliance issues and many more. List goes on and on. Govind’s depth of knowledge in the trucking industry, plus technical/software skills of SLOGN team will create a solution.  Ihor Pidruchny, Product Design  Ihor is focused on defining the product based on the business vision and bridge the technology with industry needs and opportunities. Logistics is one of the most complex industries when it comes to automation and user experience. Having spent 15 years in IT, his last 5 years were devoted to tackling complex logistical questions, workflow automation, event sourcing, distributed applications designed with resilience in mind, domain driven design and microservices.  Nanak Singh, Industry Relations  With over 12 years of working in the Trucking/Logistics industry as dispatcher, manager, and president/owner, Nanak has always yearned to bring efficiency to the industry while at the same time improving the lives of all of the people involved in operations. He managed to grow a company from 10 trucks to 130 trucks in an impressive amount of time.                 Andrew Zubko, Technology  With vast experience in networks, software design and development, Andrew focuses on choices of solutions and approaches, architecture and implementation. He guides the SLOGN development team.                  Eugene Ciurana, Advisor  Eugene provides SLOGN with global level guidance in AI, blockchain and platform design. Eugene is a technology veteran of Silicon Valley. Since his start of career in 1980s he built and sold numerous technology startups. He worked at senior positions or as advisor in companies like Walmart, Yahoo, Mulesoft, Badoo and many more.  LEGAL STRUCTURE  SLOGN is being registered as Singapore company created for investment and governance activities to fund development of decentralized open source software. SLOGN’s team unites business and technology professionals from Silicon Valley, U.S, the trucking industry, blockchain and enterprise software design.  Bridge18 Software Solutions Inc, is a Silicon Valley based company established in 2013 to provide automation, sales and back office support and integration services for trucking companies. Govind Singh, CEO of Bridge18, was renowned as a top performing graduate of Silicon Valley Chapter of Founder Institute. Bridge18 was self-funded in the amount of US $350,000.                 SLOGN has a principal agreement with Bridge18 to acquire its intellectual property and codebase for trucking dashboards and mobile wallets.  Benefits:             Open source solution with low entry barrier Competitiveness through efficiency Economy of scale due to group discounts Instant settlements and higher liquidity More transparent and secured deals Automation and Optimization of business processes  Links:          Website: https://www.slogn.net Medium: https://medium.com/@SLOGN Twitter: https://twitter.com/slogncoin Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/slognnet/ - << 1st place where we will be announcing NEXT STEPS BOUNTY AND OF PAID CODING TOURNAMENTS Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company-beta/18130326/ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb_Ookt6bE2rRtNMon0X8Qg WHITE PAPER: https://github.com/SLOGNNet/whitepaper/blob/master/whitepaper.pdf

Author: slogn
Title: [ANN] {ICO} SLOGN Logistics Coin ICO July 25 2017-UPD: ICO DEFERRED
Body: SLOGN ICO details  Timeline  ICO Start Date: July 25 2017 3:00PM GMT ICO Duration: 3 Weeks, till August 15 2017 2:59:59PM GMT  Coin Volume and Pricing   SLOGN price for ICO stage is established at: 0.0001 ETH = 1 SLOGN  Total coin supply to be issued during ICO: 8,000,000,000 (Eight Billion) SLOGNs (800,000 worth of ETH)  If less than 100,000,000 SLOGNs (10,000 ETH equivalent) sold, all transaction amounts to be returned to contributors’ wallets.  Upon successful ICO, SLOGN will allocate Open Source Tournaments Fund in this way: 10% of Open Source Tournaments Fund for vendors selection hackathons and public programming competitions; 90% of  Open Source Tournaments Fund for open source contributors reward fund.  ICO Incentives   First 20,000 ETH contributed receive 30% premium. Next 50,000 ETH contributed receive 15% premium.  Coin Distribution   70% - offered for sale during ICO 15% - retained by core team 1.5% - Advisory Board Fund 7.5% - Open Source Tournaments Fund 5% - Reserve Fund 1% - Bounty
